backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented landing-page features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global background/foreground application.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling all landing-page sections in order.
frontend/src/components/landing/Benefits: Displays benefits in a responsive card grid using icons and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Validated contact form with fields, inline errors, and a timed success state.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Contact section with WhatsApp/Call buttons and embedded contact form.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with logo, tagline, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero section with logo header, headline, CTA, trust points, and illustration.
frontend/src/components/landing/landingC: Exports static landing page content including hero text, benefits, pricing tiers, testimonials, trust badges, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingS: Reusable layout wrapper providing consistent section padding, headings, and container.
frontend/src/components/landing/PricingS: Renders pricing tiers as styled cards with features, recommended highlighting, and a button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/landing/Testimon: Displays testimonial cards with quotes, ratings, and client info in a grid layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, typography rules, and utility shadows for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, shadows, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for building a premium, mobileâ€‘responsive QuickOnline landing page with required sections, visual guidelines, and image assets. Lists implemented features, design requirements, and functional expectations for CTAs and the contact form.
